translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm afraid I'm running out of time.
translation.es: Lo siento, se me hace tarde.

translation.en: [man] Absolutely. No problem.
Okay, so last question.
Jay, go ahead.
Miss Ashby, or Eve... [chuckles]
First, may I say, it's amazing that you're here.
One of the world's leading prosecutors in international criminal law.
translation.es: Es una de las fiscales más importantes del mundo del derecho penal internacional.

translation.en: And I get to ask you a question.
Which is?
Ah, yes, it's this.
What motivates you to vomit up all this neocolonialist bullshit?
translation.es: ¿Qué la impulsa a vomitar toda esa mierda neocolonialista?

translation.en: [man] You don't have to answer. [Eve] Ah, it's all right.
translation.es: - No tiene que responder. - Está bien.

translation.en: I'm motivated to see justice done, wherever the crime took place.
translation.es: Me impulsa ver que se haga justicia, donde sea que haya ocurrido un crimen.

translation.en: And it just so happens, all these crimes, they take place in Africa?
translation.es: ¿Y casualmente todos los crímenes ocurren en África?

translation.en: We only prosecute those cases
translation.es: Solo llevamos a juicio los casos

translation.en: a country is unable or unwilling to prosecute for itself.
translation.es: que un país no puede o no quiere llevar adelante por su cuenta.

translation.en: So, what about the West Bank?
I believe that's an active situation. [stammers] Situation?
But when it comes to action, there are at least 40 individuals being prosecuted
translation.es: Pero, si hablamos de acción, actualmente hay al menos 40 individuos acusados por la Corte Penal Internacional.

translation.en: by the International Criminal Court now.
translation.es: actualmente hay al menos 40 individuos acusados por la Corte Penal Internacional.

translation.en: And each and every one of them are Africans.
Black Africans.
And I'm sure they all have a case to answer,
translation.es: Estoy segura de que todos tienen un caso al que responder

translation.en: properly represented in a court of law.
translation.es: con una representación adecuada ante un tribunal.

translation.en: But you're telling us you successfully prosecuted one of those cases.
translation.es: Pero dice que tuvo éxito como fiscal en uno de esos casos.

translation.en: Yes.
[Jay] That doesn't make you embarrassed? Embarrassed? Not at all.
translation.es: - ¿Y no se siente apenada? - ¿Apenada? Para nada.

translation.en: [laughs] Really?
Why not?
After all, isn't what you do
translation.es: ¿Acaso lo que hace no es solo el ejemplo más reciente

translation.en: just the latest example of self-righteous Western paternalism?
translation.es: ¿Acaso lo que hace no es solo el ejemplo más reciente del paternalismo de superioridad moral de Occidente?

translation.en: Of exactly the same sort that for hundreds of years has systematically decimated that continent
translation.es: Ese mismo que, durante siglos, ha despojado sistemáticamente a África

translation.en: of its wealth, its governments, its religions, and most of all, its people.
translation.es: de su riqueza, su gobierno, sus religiones y, sobre todo, sus habitantes.

translation.en: And now, having done it, you have the temerity
to expect them to turn to you for justice.
translation.es: de esperar que recurran a ustedes en busca de justicia.

translation.en: For justice that only you can provide for crimes that surely would never have happened
translation.es: Una justicia impartida solo por ustedes para crímenes que nunca habrían ocurrido

translation.en: had your world not gone there in the first place.
translation.es: si su mundo no se hubiera metido allí.

translation.en: So you're right, I wouldn't feel embarrassed.
translation.es: Tiene razón, yo no estaría apenado.

translation.en: 'Cause if I was you, I'd feel fucking ashamed.
translation.es: En su lugar, se me caería la cara de vergüenza.

translation.en: -[audience murmurs] -[man] Stop. That's it. I'm so sorry.
African problems deserve African solutions.
translation.es: Los problemas de África merecen soluciones africanas, no a ustedes.

translation.en: -They don't deserve you-- -That's it.
translation.es: Los problemas de África merecen soluciones africanas, no a ustedes. - Basta. ¡Suficiente! - Mire…

translation.en: -Look-- -[man] Enough!
-This is not the time. -Then when is the time?
translation.es: - Este no es el momento. - ¿Y cuándo lo es?

translation.en: Not now.
-I'm sorry. I really have gone far over-- -Of course.
translation.es: - Lo siento, ya me quedé más de… - Claro.

translation.en: -Everyone. -[audience applauds]
Wait.
Just a minute. Can I just say one thing?
I stand by my record because it is a record of justice. All right?
translation.es: Defiendo mi historial porque es un historial de justicia.

translation.en: Whatever the cause, whatever the history,
translation.es: Sin importar la causa ni la historia,

translation.en: we have delivered justice to the people who needed it most
translation.es: logramos justicia para las personas que más la necesitaban

translation.en: when otherwise they might not have had it at all.
translation.es: cuando, de otro modo, podrían no haberla tenido.

translation.en: And I'm proud to have done that, and I'm proud to keep doing that.
translation.es: Y estoy orgullosa de haberlo hecho y de seguir haciéndolo.

translation.en: [Eve] So, all right.
And it may help you to know that my daughter is black
translation.es: Y tal vez le sirva saber que mi hija es negra…

translation.en: -and she was born in Africa. -It doesn't.
translation.es: …y que nació en África. No sirve.

translation.en: Not unless she's the one with the solutions.
translation.es: No, a menos que ella tenga las soluciones.

translation.en: Shit.
[man] Are you sure you don't want to wait?
[woman] This is about me, not her.
translation.es: Se trata de mí, no de ella.

translation.en: [man] Last time, she said she wanted to be here.
translation.es: La última vez, dijo que quería venir.

translation.en: [woman] But here I am.
And I have come all on my own.
Maybe that's how she wants it.
translation.es: Tal vez así lo quiera ella.

translation.en: [man] And how do you feel about that?
We've had this conversation a couple of times now.
translation.es: Ya hablamos de esto varias veces.

translation.en: And how do you feel about that?
Ready to stop having it.
translation.es: Con ganas de no hablar más.

translation.en: Ever the lawyer, huh?
Actually, I'm a legal investigator.
Slightly different.
And how are things at work?
Not too much pressure?
Americano? Flat white?
Can't give a nutjob too much responsibility.
translation.es: Una loca no puede tener grandes responsabilidades.

translation.en: [man] Do you see yourself as a patient...
or a protagonist?
Ah... [clicks tongue] Okay.
Well, I see myself as a patient.
translation.es: Bueno, me veo como una paciente.

translation.en: We all are.
Only the truly mad think they're in control of their life.
translation.es: Solo los verdaderamente locos creen tener control sobre su vida.

translation.en: Is that Adam West enough for you, Mr. Riddler?
translation.es: ¿Es una respuesta digna de Adam West, señor Acertijo?

translation.en: Okay.
So there you are.
-Full supply. -But?
You read everything we suggested?
translation.es: - ¿Leíste todo lo que te sugerimos? - ¿Realmente le diría que no?

translation.en: -Am I really going to tell you I didn't? -But the stuff on survivor's guilt?
translation.es: - ¿Leíste todo lo que te sugerimos? - ¿Realmente le diría que no? Pero ¿lo de la culpa del sobreviviente?

translation.en: -Primo Levi. -[soft piano music playing]
Interesting choice.
And... did it...
connect with you?
See, that's my problem, Doc.
I don't know who it is I'm supposed to connect with.
translation.es: No sé con quién debería conectarme.

translation.en: Guess that's why I tried to kill myself.
translation.es: Supongo que por eso traté de matarme.

translation.en: [doctor] Did you?
Really?
If I ever do try, I'll be sure to take a leaf out of Mr. Levi's book
translation.es: Si alguna vez lo intento, seguiré el ejemplo del señor Levi

translation.en: and jump straight out the window.
[chuckles] I'm just kidding.
I'm just kidding with you. It's a joke.
translation.es: Solo estoy bromeando. Es un chiste.

translation.en: Thanks.
Do you know your birth name?
No.
Want to find out?
No.
[clicks tongue] There's no one left alive to tell me.
translation.es: No queda nadie vivo para decírmelo.

translation.en: Oh, for fuck's sake.
-I'll find it myself. -It's all right!
-I'm here. -[sighs]
Oh, my God, I'm so sorry.
It's fine.
I was at this lecture, and...
it was fucking horrible, and I couldn't get out.
translation.es: Fue horrible y no podía escaparme.

translation.en: -[woman] It's all right. -Then there was the traffic,
translation.es: Está bien. Luego, el puto tráfico y mi celular, que se quedó sin batería.

translation.en: and my fucking phone's run out.
translation.es: Luego, el puto tráfico y mi celular, que se quedó sin batería.

translation.en: Why do they keep putting all this shit in it if the battery can't cope?
translation.es: ¿Por qué les ponen tantas mierdas si la batería no aguanta?

translation.en: Look. It's fine.
-[Eve sighs] -Really.
Everything is fine.
Are you sure?
-[woman] Yes. -It's okay?
-Yes. -You didn't need me?
[chuckles] No.
-[sighs] So, what did he say? -[woman clicks tongue]
I'm a patient,
protagonist... some kind of bullshit.
translation.es: Soy una paciente, una protagonista… Una mierda por el estilo.

translation.en: -But you don't have to come back? -Nope.
Not unless I exceed the stated dose again.
translation.es: No, a menos que me exceda en la dosis… de nuevo.

translation.en: Not even in jest.
translation.es: No lo digas ni en broma.

translation.en: You're talking to a major depressive. This is how we cope.
translation.es: Tengo depresión grave, así es como se sobrelleva.

translation.en: [sighs] You're fantastic, you know that?
-Mm-hmm. -[Eve] No, you really are.
And what doesn't kill us...
translation.es: Y lo que no nos mata…

translation.en: ...waits for another chance.
But not with you.
Yes?
[clicks tongue] Not with me.
I love you. [woman] I know.
You want to go out for supper?
Well, unless one of my 57 boyfriends have called,
translation.es: Bueno, a menos que me llame uno de mis 57 novios,

translation.en: I may find myself strangely available.
-There are reasons for that, my darling. -Certainly are.
translation.es: - Por algún motivo será, mi cielo. - Claro que sí.

translation.en: Not the least, watching a man's dick shrivel
translation.es: Como ver al pene de un hombre quedar como una nuez

translation.en: to the size of a cashew nut every time he looks at my stomach.
translation.es: Como ver al pene de un hombre quedar como una nuez cada vez que ve mi estómago.

translation.en: So keep your top on.
Practical advice.
Always welcome.
-[Eve] What else are mothers for? -[woman laughs]
[woman] Michael.
You knew I wasn't going to be in the office this afternoon.
translation.es: Sabías que no estaría en la oficina esta tarde.

translation.en: -You okay? -Oh, yeah.
Price of a green conscience.
translation.es: El precio de tener conciencia ecológica.

translation.en: I once shot at a polar bear.
translation.es: Una vez le disparé a un oso polar.

translation.en: -[woman] Yeah? -Yeah.
I missed.
You okay now?
Definitely.
I am, yeah.
[Michael] Ready to do some proper work?
Sure.
Come in and see me.
Thanks.
Good.
You came all this way just to say that?
I'm looking for your mother.
Oh. She'll be in the office.
No, I went there.
-She's on her way, probably held up. -Her phone's switched off.
translation.es: Se habrá retrasado. Tiene el teléfono apagado.

translation.en: Is there a problem?
Might be a case coming in.
-Big one. -[woman] Oh.
Which one?
[in Swahili] Open up this gate!
Open it!
-[gun cocks] -[man] Simon.
Why are you here? To see you.
And even put on my old uniform. It is a little bit tight! [chuckles]
translation.es: Hasta me puse mi viejo uniforme. Me queda apretado.

translation.en: [in English] This has been going on for a while.
translation.es: Esto viene pasando hace tiempo ya.

translation.en: They keep stopping my trucks from entering.
translation.es: - Siguen sin dejar entrar a mis camiones. - Así es.

translation.en: -Yes, they do. -[Simon] Why?
translation.es: - Siguen sin dejar entrar a mis camiones. - Así es. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Because they keep turning up with the wrong paperwork.
translation.es: Siguen viniendo sin los papeles correctos.

translation.en: What paperwork?
Section 1502 of the Dodd-Frank Act
translation.es: La Sección 1502 de la ley Dodd-Frank

translation.en: requires us to guarantee that all the minerals imported--
translation.es: nos exige garantizar que todos los minerales importados…

translation.en: The fucking Americans?
...all minerals imported from the Democratic Republic of the Congo
translation.es: …que todos los minerales importados de la República Democrática del Congo

translation.en: into our country are conflict-free.
translation.es: que entren a nuestro país estén libres de conflicto.

translation.en: Your trucks have no such certification, and therefore they cannot pass.
translation.es: Tus camiones no tienen esa certificación, así que no pueden pasar.

translation.en: -I am fighting a war... -[man] I know.
translation.es: - Estoy peleando una guerra… - Lo sé.

translation.en: -...for you. -Simon.
-Because the Americans tell you-- -Because the war is over.
translation.es: - Porque EE. UU. dice… - Porque la guerra terminó.

translation.en: And in peacetime, you cannot keep stealing from those mines.
translation.es: Y, en tiempos de paz, no puedes seguir robando de las minas.

translation.en: -How else do I pay my men? -You don't.
translation.es: - ¿Y cómo les pago a mis hombres? - No les pagas.

translation.en: You let them go.
My officers would rather die than leave my sight.
translation.es: Mis oficiales preferirían morir antes que dejarme.

translation.en: Your officers offered to shoot you whilst you slept.
translation.es: Se ofrecieron a dispararte mientras dormías.

translation.en: You have not paid them for a long time.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no les pagas.

translation.en: [voice growing louder] Because you keep stopping my fucking trucks!
Simon.
Simon, look at me.
Do you remember... Kabale, before the war?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cómo era Kabali antes de la guerra?

translation.en: What was that?
Anyway, we were in this taxi, you and me, and I asked the driver--
translation.es: Bueno, tú y yo estábamos en un taxi y le pregunté al taxista…

translation.en: -No. -What?
David, with the long story. It was just to make a point.
translation.es: - David, ve al grano. - Era solo para ilustrar un punto.

translation.en: So make it.
The dog ends up dead in a ditch, and the cat gets away.
translation.es: El perro termina muerto en una zanja y el gato escapa.

translation.en: That is your point? For you not to be the dog, yes.
translation.es: - ¿Ese es tu punto? - Sí, que no seas el perro.

translation.en: There is someone here to see you.
translation.es: Hay alguien aquí que quiere verte.

translation.en: He's from the US Embassy.
translation.es: Es de la Embajada de EE. UU.

translation.en: -No. -[David] He has something to offer.
What can a muzungu offer me?
A way to end this now.
translation.es: Una forma de terminar con esto ahora.

translation.en: A way home.
If I want to go home...
I just walk there.
I think you're going to have to go somewhere else first, my old friend.
translation.es: Creo que primero tendrás que ir a otro lado, amigo.

translation.en: Where?
[man] General Nyamoya, welcome to The Hague.
translation.es: Bienvenido a La Haya, general Nyamoya.

translation.en: In other news,
rebel army leader General Simon Nyamoya is tonight behind bars in Holland,
translation.es: El líder del ejército rebelde, el general Simon Nyamoya, se encuentra preso en Holanda

translation.en: awaiting trial for war crimes at the International Criminal Court.
translation.es: mientras espera ser juzgado por crímenes de guerra en la Corte Penal Internacional.

translation.en: Tracy Shulman has this report.
[Tracy] 1994, and while the world looked elsewhere,
translation.es: En 1994, mientras el mundo miraba hacia otro lado,

translation.en: the small East African state of Rwanda stared into the abyss.
translation.es: el pequeño estado africano de Ruanda miraba hacia el abismo.

translation.en: Eight hundred thousand massacred in a hundred-day killing frenzy
translation.es: Ochocientas mil personas fueron masacradas en una matanza frenética de 100 días

translation.en: while the international community stood by.
translation.es: mientras la comunidad internacional se mantenía al margen.

translation.en: The perpetrators, members of the Hutu majority,
translation.es: Los autores eran miembros de la mayoría hutu

translation.en: led by a genocidal government, who, overnight,
translation.es: liderados por un gobierno genocida que, de la noche a la mañana,

translation.en: turned on their Tutsi neighbors, following years of ethnic tension.
translation.es: se volvió en contra de sus vecinos tutsis después de años de tensión étnica.

translation.en: The saviors, a returning Tutsi Army, the RPF,
translation.es: Los salvadores fueron los soldados de un ejército tutsi, el FPR,

translation.en: which General Simon Nyamoya helped to lead.
translation.es: que el general Simon Nyamoya ayudó a dirigir.

translation.en: The RPF brought the savagery to an end
translation.es: El FPR puso fin a la barbarie

translation.en: and were applauded the world over for their heroism.
translation.es: y fue aplaudido en todo el mundo por su heroísmo.

translation.en: But a quarter of a century on, a different story.
translation.es: Pero 25 años después, la historia es otra.

translation.en: Today, Simon Nyamoya is no longer the heroic victor of yesteryear,
translation.es: Hoy, Simon Nyamoya ya no es el heroico vencedor de antaño,

translation.en: but instead, wears the badgeless beret of a Congolese mercenary,
translation.es: sino que lleva la boina sin insignias de un mercenario congoleño

translation.en: fueling endless conflicts on illicit riches
translation.es: y provoca interminables conflictos por las riquezas ilícitas robadas de las minas de la región.

translation.en: stolen from the region's mines.
translation.es: por las riquezas ilícitas robadas de las minas de la región.

translation.en: That Nyamoya is finally to face his day in court
translation.es: Que Nyamoya se enfrente finalmente a la corte

translation.en: may indeed be cause for celebration.
translation.es: puede que sea motivo de celebración.

translation.en: Although, having already been ostracized by his old allies,
translation.es: Aunque, al haber sido condenado al ostracismo por sus antiguos aliados,

translation.en: whether he remained an actual threat to the region is harder to assess.
translation.es: es más difícil evaluar si seguía siendo una amenaza real para la región.

translation.en: Indeed, Bibi Mundanzi, Rwanda's long-term president
translation.es: De hecho, Bibi Mundanzi, la presidenta de Ruanda,

translation.en: has yet to comment.
However, she has previously questioned why the West targets men like Nyamoya,
translation.es: Pero ya ha cuestionado antes que Occidente se centre en hombres como Nyamoya

translation.en: when far worse criminals,
translation.es: mientras otros criminales mucho peores, como algunos responsables del genocidio,

translation.en: some responsible for the genocide itself, remain at-large and untouched.
translation.es: mientras otros criminales mucho peores, como algunos responsables del genocidio, siguen libres e impunes.

translation.en: [David] Of course, there are many people hiding in our neighboring forests
translation.es: Por supuesto, hay muchas personas escondidas en los bosques vecinos

translation.en: responsible for acts of genocide against this country,
translation.es: que son responsables de actos genocidas cometidos en contra del país, pero…

translation.en: but they cannot hide forever
-and they will be caught. -[woman] In the meantime,
translation.es: Y serán capturadas. Mientras tanto, envía alegremente a Simon Nyamoya, su antiguo aliado,

translation.en: you're happy to be sending Simon Nyamoya, your onetime ally,
translation.es: Mientras tanto, envía alegremente a Simon Nyamoya, su antiguo aliado,

translation.en: to the International Criminal Court.
General Nyamoya gave himself up
translation.es: El general Nyamoya se entregó por su cuenta a EE. UU.

translation.en: to the Americans. We did not send him anywhere.
translation.es: El general Nyamoya se entregó por su cuenta a EE. UU. Nosotros no lo mandamos.

translation.en: [woman] But is the president happy to see him tried there?
translation.es: ¿A la presidenta le parece bien que se lo juzgue allí?

translation.en: She is happy to see justice occur wherever it is delivered.
translation.es: Le parece bien que se haga justicia donde sea que se imparta.

translation.en: [woman] But in the past she's been highly critical of the ICC.
translation.es: Pero, en el pasado, ha criticado mucho a la CPI.

translation.en: Officially, she doesn't even recognize it.
We have a great faith in the international community.
translation.es: Tenemos mucha fe en la comunidad internacional.

translation.en: I may remind you that in the last year alone,
translation.es: Les recuerdo que, solo en el último año,

translation.en: we have enjoyed investments of $1.2 billion;
translation.es: hemos tenido inversiones de 1200 millones de dólares.

translation.en: and not just in charity, but business, in banking,
translation.es: Y no solo en el ámbito de la caridad, también en el empresarial, el bancario,

translation.en: mining, tourism, construction, all regulated, certified, and guaranteed.
translation.es: el de la minería, el turismo, la construcción… Todo regulado, certificado y garantizado.

translation.en: Our doors are open. The world is welcome.
translation.es: Nuestras puertas están abiertas. El mundo es bienvenido.

translation.en: And is General Nyamoya the price for that?
translation.es: ¿Y el general Nyamoya es el precio a pagar?

translation.en: What price?
You keep saying this.
General Nyamoya gave himself up to the scrutiny of international justice.
translation.es: El general Nyamoya se entregó solo al escrutinio de la justicia internacional.

translation.en: And because of this, I am certain he will receive exactly the trial he deserves.
translation.es: Y por eso, estoy seguro de que el general tendrá el juicio que merece.

translation.en: [woman] No.
She goes on a list. That's the best I can offer.
translation.es: Entrará en la lista. Es lo mejor que puedo ofrecer.

translation.en: The last time Eve Ashby prosecuted the case here,
translation.es: La última vez que Eve Ashby tomó un caso aquí,

translation.en: she won in record time.
You could do with another one of those.
translation.es: Les vendría bien otra victoria así.

translation.en: And she will be carefully considered along with the others.
translation.es: Y la tendremos en cuenta igual que a los demás.

translation.en: Come on, Capi, what do I have to do to make this work, huh?
translation.es: Vamos, Capi. ¿Qué tengo que hacer para que definamos esto?

translation.en: Join the queue.
Good morning.
Madam Secretary.
Assistant Secretary, Peter. More talk like that will get me fired.
translation.es: - Señora secretaria. - Subsecretaria, Peter. Si sigues diciendo eso, me van a despedir.

translation.en: [Peter] I thought we'd lost you for the day.
translation.es: Creí que ya no volvía hoy.

translation.en: But now I'm back. That's politics, baby.
translation.es: Pero volví. Así es la política, nene.

translation.en: God, I'm starving.
So, what can I have?
You told me to resist these questions as if you were the Devil himself.
translation.es: Me dijo que resistiera estas preguntas como si usted fuera el mismo diablo.

translation.en: So, what can I have?
-[Peter] A handful of unsalted almonds. -[scoffs]
translation.es: Un puñado de almendras sin sal.

translation.en: Okay.
And a copy of the indictment in the General Nyamoya case?
translation.es: ¿Y una copia del acta de acusación del caso Nyamoya?

translation.en: A perfect complement.
And set up a call with Capi Petridis ASAP.
translation.es: Y arregla una llamada con Capi Petridis.

translation.en: [Capi] And with whose authority are you making this request?
translation.es: ¿Con autoridad de quién me haces esta petición?

translation.en: [assistant secretary] Capi, I'm head of the Bureau of African Affairs.
translation.es: Capi, soy directora del Gabinete de Asuntos Africanos.

translation.en: I think it's fair to say that my authority is all you need to hear.
translation.es: Creo que mi autoridad es suficiente para hacerlo.

translation.en: -Okay. I've heard it. -And what are you gonna do about it?
translation.es: - Está bien. Lo hiciste. - ¿Y qué piensas hacer al respecto?

translation.en: Eunice, her name is on the list along with the others.
translation.es: Eunice, su nombre está en la lista junto con los otros.

translation.en: And what I'm suggesting to you is there should only be one name on that list.
translation.es: Y lo que te estoy sugiriendo es que haya un solo nombre en esa lista:

translation.en: Eve Ashby.
Your suggestion is noted.
Noted?
Capi, I'm not sure you're quite getting what I'm offering here.
translation.es: Capi, creo que no entiendes lo que te estoy ofreciendo.

translation.en: My government has yet to ratify the Rome Statute,
translation.es: Mi gobierno aún no ha ratificado el Estatuto de Roma,

translation.en: and therefore we still do not recognize your court.
translation.es: y aún no reconocemos a la corte.

translation.en: But here is a perfect opportunity for us to take a big step towards that.
translation.es: Pero esta es la oportunidad perfecta para que demos un paso en esa dirección.

translation.en: I strongly advise you to grab it.
Just because she's an old friend of yours?
translation.es: ¿Solo porque es una vieja amiga tuya?

translation.en: Because she is the best prosecutor there is.
translation.es: Porque es la mejor fiscal que existe.

translation.en: And you'll need her.
You knew she was going to do that?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que Capi iba a hacer eso?

translation.en: We're on.
You can't do it.
-I've said yes. -Say no.
translation.es: - Ya dije que sí. - Di que no.

translation.en: -I understand your feelings. -Which one?
I have so many.
-I know it must feel very close-- -Close?
translation.es: - Sé que debes sentirlo muy cercano… - ¿Cercano?

translation.en: General Nyamoya is a Rwandan Tutsi, Mama.
translation.es: El general Nyamoya es un tutsi de Ruanda, mamá.

translation.en: Who is accused -of 13 counts of war crimes. -Who helped stop the genocide.
translation.es: - Con 13 cargos por crímenes de guerra. - Ayudó a parar el genocidio.

translation.en: And then he went into the Congo--
-I'm a Rwandan Tutsi, Mama. -No!
translation.es: - Yo soy una tutsi de Ruanda. - ¡No!

translation.en: You have a British passport
translation.es: Tú tienes pasaporte británico y eres mi hija.

translation.en: -and you're my daughter. -Yes. Only because I survived.
translation.es: Tú tienes pasaporte británico y eres mi hija. ¡Sí! Solo porque sobreviví. Y sin ellos, ¿cómo lo hubiera hecho?

translation.en: And without them, how would that have happened?
translation.es: ¡Sí! Solo porque sobreviví. Y sin ellos, ¿cómo lo hubiera hecho?

translation.en: -It's not so simple, darling. -It is to me.
translation.es: - No es tan simple. - Lo es para mí.

translation.en: I mean, to me, what you're doing, it's like the Second World War is over, and we're Jewish,
translation.es: Es como si la Segunda Guerra hubiera terminado y fuéramos judías…

translation.en: and suddenly you've decided to prosecute General Eisenhower because he tried to stop Hitler.
translation.es: …y tú decidieras enjuiciar a Eisenhower por querer detener a Hitler.

translation.en: Well, if Eisenhower had committed war crimes
translation.es: Y si hubiera cometido crímenes de guerra, habría sido enjui…

translation.en: -he would have been prosecuted-- -Yes! But not by you!
translation.es: Y si hubiera cometido crímenes de guerra, habría sido enjui… ¡Sí! Pero no por ti. ¡No por ti, mi madre!

translation.en: Not you, my mother!
translation.es: ¡Sí! Pero no por ti. ¡No por ti, mi madre!

translation.en: Because for me, it's like the SS is still out there.
translation.es: Porque, para mí, es como si aún existieran las SS.

translation.en: And all you're trying to do is prosecute one of the few men who tried to stop them!
translation.es: ¡Y tú quisieras llevar a juicio a uno de los pocos que intentó detenerlas!

translation.en: [sniffles] Are you...
Are you trying to drive a wedge between us, Mama?
Make me stand on my own two feet?
translation.es: ¿Hacer que me valga por mí misma?

translation.en: Do you think you can't?
Do you think I should?
I think you're ready. Yes.
If you have me hovering over you for the rest of your life,
translation.es: Y que si me tienes encima tuyo el resto de tu vida,

translation.en: you'll never ever fly.
So...
So, all this is-- is what? A way to cut me loose?
translation.es: ¿Qué es todo esto? ¿Una forma de soltarme?

translation.en: No.
You can't choose when something happens, Kate.
translation.es: No podemos elegir cuándo pasan las cosas, Kate.

translation.en: If it was 18 months ago, of course I wouldn't have done it,
translation.es: Si hubiese sido hace 18 meses, no lo habría hecho.

translation.en: but it's not. It's now. And now you are better.
translation.es: Pero no fue así, es ahora. Y ahora estás mejor.

translation.en: -And now I have to take this case. -[crying] But why?
translation.es: - Y ahora debo tomar este caso. - ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Because it's the right thing to do.
Who for?
You?
-Everyone. -Not me.
Everyone.
Trust me.
There are still men
in the Congo
responsible for the genocide, Mum.
You want to do the right thing?
You should prosecute them.
Oh, it's fine.
-You sure? -[doctor] Yes, yes.
It's just a mole. Not cancer.
translation.es: Solo es una verruga. No es cáncer.

translation.en: Okay?
It's quite large, though. I can remove it for you. Peace of mind?
translation.es: Es bastante grande igual, puedo quitársela para que esté tranquilo.

translation.en: [man] No. It's fine.
It's very simple. A few minutes, no problem.
translation.es: Es muy simple, son unos minutos nada más.

translation.en: [man] No, no, no, no, no.
I'll wait until I go home.
translation.es: Lo haré al volver a mi hogar.

translation.en: You don't trust me?
No, no, no, no, it's just...
Ah, you know.
Know what?
It's fine, Doctor. Really. Thanks for looking. It's much appreciated.
translation.es: Está bien, doctor. En serio. Gracias por revisarme. Se lo agradezco.

translation.en: Do you want francs or dollars?
You suspect I will flee the country?
-Francs. -[indistinct chatter]
What the fuck?
Who was that?
-Who? -That guy, just went through.
translation.es: - ¿Quién? - El tipo que acaba de pasar.

translation.en: [doctor] I don't know.
I do.
You work for the hospital...
or do you work for him?
Oh, it's okay.
I already know.
Major. Major!
You've not paid.
You know who that guy is?
That guy is a war criminal with an international warrant on his head.
translation.es: Es un criminal de guerra con una orden internacional a su nombre.

translation.en: -No. -Oh, yes.
His name is Patrice Ganimana.
He's like a Hutu General who took part in the Rwandan genocide.
translation.es: es un general hutu que participó en el genocidio de Ruanda.

translation.en: He's responsible for the death of about a million people.
translation.es: Es responsable de la muerte de casi un millón de personas.

translation.en: No.
Right here in your hospital.
translation.es: Y está aquí, en su hospital.

translation.en: Sitting in a wheelchair.
-Pretty nurses and everything. -Who?
Patrice Ganimana.
Yeah.
He may not be the ace of spades, but he is certainly the ten of clubs.
translation.es: Tal vez no sea el más buscado, pero es uno de los principales.

translation.en: Sometimes, sir...
Europeans have difficulty telling our faces apart.
-No, no, no. -You're mistaken.
The fuck I am!
-Please, sir, you are in a hospital. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Por favor, está en un hospital. - Sí.

translation.en: And he should be in The Hague.
translation.es: Y él debería estar en La Haya.

translation.en: [doctor] Please.
Just pay your bill.
Keep the change.
Oh, yeah.
[major] I know them.
-[car door slams] -You haven't answered the question.
And you haven't picked up that file.
translation.es: Y tú no miraste ese archivo.

translation.en: It's an immigration appeal. I'd like your opinion on it.
translation.es: Es una apelación de inmigración, quisiera tu opinión.

translation.en: Why did you give her the Nyamoya case?
translation.es: ¿Por qué le diste el caso Nyamoya?

translation.en: I'm not saying there's any pressure on your room rental, Kate,
translation.es: No digo que tengan problemas para pagar el alquiler, Kate,

translation.en: but obviously I wouldn't be saying it if there wasn't.
translation.es: pero si lo menciono es por algo.

translation.en: They're prosecuting the wrong man, on the wrong side.
translation.es: Están llevando a juicio al hombre y el lado equivocados.

translation.en: And you've chosen the wrong person to do it.
translation.es: Y elegiste a la persona equivocada para hacerlo.

translation.en: Because he is a Tutsi?
And so am I.
Then you will be delighted when the judge agrees with you.
translation.es: Entonces, te alegrarás cuando el juez coincida contigo.

translation.en: It isn't your world.
-[Michael] The Congo? -The genocide.
I prosecuted one of the first cases for the ICTR in '98.
translation.es: En 1998, tomé una de las primeras causas del Tribunal Penal Internacional para Ruanda.

translation.en: Your mother was my junior.
translation.es: Tu madre era mi ayudante, ahí nos conocimos.

translation.en: It's where we met. I'd go so far as to say it's why you're here.
translation.es: Tu madre era mi ayudante, ahí nos conocimos. Hasta diría que es la razón por la que estás aquí.

translation.en: And I don't wanna go back to any of it.
translation.es: Y no quiero volver a nada de eso.

translation.en: Ever.
Do you think your mother loves you, Kate? You think she'd ever do anything to harm you?
translation.es: ¿Crees que tu madre te ama, Kate? ¿Crees que haría algo para lastimarte?

translation.en: That's a silly question. It is. So why do you keep asking it?
translation.es: - Es una pregunta estúpida. - Lo es. Entonces, ¿por qué la haces?

translation.en: Your mother's one of the most steadfast and loyal people I have ever met,
translation.es: Tu madre es una de las personas más resueltas y leales que conozco,

translation.en: and most of that has been directed at you. She's also one of the smartest.
translation.es: y la mayor parte de eso es en relación a ti. También es una de las más inteligentes.

translation.en: So if she's chosen to prosecute Simon Nyamoya,
translation.es: Así que, si la eligen como fiscal en el caso Nyamoya,

translation.en: I'd trust her to do it.
translation.es: confío en que lo hará bien.

translation.en: Let her do her job, Kate.
And you...
do yours. I'd like that back in the morning.
translation.es: …haz el tuyo. Quiero eso para mañana.

translation.en: -Oh, Miss Ashby. -Hi, Frank.
Sweetheart?
Sweetheart,
would you close the door?
Yes.
Thank you.
-[man] Mine's a flat white. -[Kate chuckles]
You taking on a new case?
Just an opinion.
Well, it's a start.
I didn't think this was allowed.
translation.es: Creí que esto no estaba permitido.

translation.en: Thought we weren't allowed to be in the same room together.
translation.es: Creí que no podíamos estar en la misma habitación.

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Of course we are. Alone?
I'm leaving, Kate.
What?
Your mother's asked me to be her permanent rep on the Nayamoya case.
translation.es: Tu mamá me pidió que sea su representante en el caso Nyamoya.

translation.en: You're going to The Hague?
Yep.
Wow.
You know she only got it yesterday? Yeah, but...
translation.es: - ¿Sabes que recién lo recibió ayer? - Sí, pero…

translation.en: We saw it coming.
How?
All I know is...
everyone was pushing Nyamoya to hand himself in.
translation.es: …es que todos estaban presionando a Nyamoya para que se entregara.

translation.en: The DRC, Rwanda, us, the Americans,
translation.es: La RDC, Ruanda, nosotros, EE. UU…

translation.en: everyone.
-Why? -Uh...
-He was a warlord. -There are others out there, far worse.
translation.es: - Era un caudillo militar. - Hay otros sueltos que son mucho peores.

translation.en: Well... same thing's happening to them.
translation.es: - Era un caudillo militar. - Hay otros sueltos que son mucho peores. Les pasará lo mismo.

translation.en: [scoffs] Haven't seen it.
[chuckles softly] Yes. We have.
There was a... -genocide guy-- -"Genocide guy."
Look, the region just wants to move on, Kate.
translation.es: La región solo quiere mirar hacia adelante, Kate.

translation.en: A fresh start.
So should you.
[man 1] FIB have been informed.
translation.es: La Brigada de Intervención ha sido informada.

translation.en: [major] And when do you think they'll show up?
Next week, next month, next year?
translation.es: ¿La semana que viene? ¿El mes que viene? ¿El año próximo?

translation.en: And how long does it take to get an X-ray? Because I think that's what he was having.
translation.es: ¿Y cuánto tardan las radiografías? Porque creo que eso iban a hacerle.

translation.en: What are you trying to do here, Major?
Not to repeat past mistakes, sir.
Like?
Well, I come from Quebec.
And the last time a Canadian was in charge of this sort of thing
translation.es: Y la última vez que un canadiense estuvo a cargo de algo así

translation.en: was over in Rwanda during the genocide.
translation.es: fue en Ruanda durante el genocidio.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] It didn't end so well.
I'm hoping the same thing won't happen to me.
translation.es: No quisiera que me pase lo mismo.

translation.en: Or... and, with the greatest respect, sir...
translation.es: O, y con todo respeto, señor…

translation.en: to you.
Me?
[major] You're French.
Some people think it was you guys, back then, that helped people like this, uh...
translation.es: Algunos piensan que fueron ustedes los que ayudaron a personas como…

translation.en: Ganimana here, to escape in the first place.
Not me, Major. In '94 I was reading Lucky Luke.
translation.es: Yo no, mayor. En 1994, estaba leyendo Lucky Luke.

translation.en: Well,
then you better hope that some of that has rubbed off.
translation.es: Esperemos que se le haya pegado algo de eso.

translation.en: You carry on like this, you're going to need it.
translation.es: Si siguen así, lo va a necesitar.

translation.en: Continue.
[Michael] Oh, lady... save it for the judge.
translation.es: Ay, mujer… Deja eso para el juez.

translation.en: You may want to...
choose a corner of that.
There's not a day passed I hadn't thought of telling her.
translation.es: No hay un día en que no haya pensado en decírselo.

translation.en: And then when she...
When she tried to do what she did, I knew why I hadn't.
translation.es: …intentó hacer lo que hizo, supe por qué no lo había hecho.

translation.en: It's what we all agreed.
[sniffles] But what if I was wrong? What if it's the other way around?
translation.es: ¿Y si me equivoco? ¿Y si es al revés?

translation.en: What if she only did what she did precisely because I hadn't told her?
translation.es: ¿Si hizo lo que hizo precisamente porque no se lo dije?

translation.en: You can't think like that.
[sighs] 'Cause it damns me both ways.
translation.es: Porque me condena en ambos casos.

translation.en: You rescued a child.
And you gave her a life.
But not her past.
And you're about to do that, too.
What if I was right in the first place? What if she's still not ready?
translation.es: ¿Y si yo tenía razón y aún no está lista?

translation.en: Is that it?
Yes.
Maybe you should've let me take the case.
translation.es: Tal vez debas dejarme el caso a mí.

translation.en: She's my daughter.
But it's not just about her now, is it?
translation.es: Pero ya no se trata solo de ella.

translation.en: It's about that and this.
translation.es: Se trata de eso… y esto.

translation.en: -And seeing this done at last. -I know what it's about, Michael.
translation.es: - Y que se haga esto de una vez. - Sé de qué se trata, Michael.

translation.en: Then you've answered your own question, haven't you?
translation.es: Entonces, ya respondiste tu propia pregunta.

translation.en: This is our chance. It might not come again.
translation.es: Es nuestra oportunidad, podría no haber otra.

translation.en: We gotta take it while we can.
You're right, of course you are.
Been a long time coming.
Over 20 years.
And sometimes I feel whatever it is we've been holding out for or...
translation.es: Y a veces siento que lo que sea que hemos estado esperando…

translation.en: clinging onto, I don't know.
It's dragged me out so far, I...
translation.es: me ha arrastrado tan lejos que…

translation.en: I'm not sure I can ever get back.
But, I mean, you will.
You'll be fine. And so will Kate.
I wish we'd fallen in love.
But we didn't.
It's why we're still friends.
[Nyamoya] She has connections with Rwanda.
translation.es: CENTRO DE DETENCIÓN DE LA CPI, LA HAYA - Tiene conexiones con Ruanda. - Así es.

translation.en: Oh, yes. She adopted a Rwandan child, and she helped prosecute
translation.es: - Tiene conexiones con Ruanda. - Así es. Adoptó a una niña de Ruanda y ayudó en el juicio

translation.en: one of the first cases after the genocide.
translation.es: de uno de los primeros casos posteriores al genocidio.

translation.en: Against the men who carried out the genocide.
translation.es: En contra de los hombres responsables del genocidio.

translation.en: Yep.
Which I helped bring to an end.
translation.es: Al cual yo ayudé a poner fin.

translation.en: So,
she and I,
we are on the same side.
We'd better hope so. There's no hope about it.
translation.es: - Esperemos que sí. - No hay nada que esperar.

translation.en: We are on the same side.
It's not about sides.
[David] Isn't it?
Back then, you and Nyamoya were chasing the same thing.
translation.es: En ese entonces, tú y Nyamoya perseguían lo mismo.

translation.en: Evil Hutus. You as a lawyer, him as a soldier.
translation.es: A los malvados hutus. Tú como abogada y él como soldado.

translation.en: And because of that, you're asking me to...
do what, exactly?
To remove him from the field, no doubt, but also, perhaps,
translation.es: Sacarlo del juego, por supuesto. Pero también, quizás…

translation.en: to allow him to return
to an entirely peaceful retirement in the not-too-distant future.
translation.es: …permitirle regresar y retirarse pacíficamente en un futuro no muy lejano.

translation.en: He was a hero after all.
translation.es: Después de todo, fue un héroe.

translation.en: [sighs] A hero.
Just because you asked me to forget doesn't mean I did.
translation.es: Que me hayas pedido que lo olvide no quiere decir que lo haya hecho.

translation.en: The indictment accuses him of the enlistment of child soldiers
translation.es: La acusación lo inculpa de alistar a niños soldados

translation.en: for the purposes of war in the DRC from 2004...
translation.es: para luchar en guerras en la RDC desde 2004…

translation.en: -It's not the date I'm interested in. -...to 2006.
translation.es: - No es la fecha que me interesa. - …hasta 2006.

translation.en: Then which? I just told you.
The one you asked me to forget.
translation.es: La que me pediste que olvidara…

translation.en: Back then.
-I thought I was visiting a friend. -Friends don't ask people to lie.
translation.es: - Creí que venía a ver a una amiga. - Los amigos no te piden que mientas.

translation.en: -And friends don't try to undermine you. -By telling them the truth?
David, isn't that exactly what friends are for?
translation.es: ¿Acaso los amigos no están para eso?

translation.en: Aw, Eve. We're used to seeing zealots in dog collars.
translation.es: Ay, Eve. Estamos acostumbrados a ver fanáticos con collares de perro.

translation.en: But not in horsehair wigs.
Neither will save my country.
translation.es: Ninguno de los dos salvará a mi país.

translation.en: -It's a little more complex than that. -[scoffs]
Isn't it?
We have a duty to memory.
translation.es: Se lo debemos a la memoria.

translation.en: Whose?
Hers?
-Yours? -Everyone's.
-Some things are best left forgotten. -Not this.
translation.es: - Algunas cosas es mejor olvidarlas. - Esto no.

translation.en: Tell them now, David. Now that the going's good.
translation.es: Diles ahora, David, ahora que todo va bien.

translation.en: Thank you for the drink.
And for what you did for us, all of those years ago.
translation.es: Y por lo que hiciste por nosotros hace tantos años.

translation.en: -I want to stay." -Hey, Harper.
Mikey.
How's my girl today?
Oh, grand, just grand.
What are you reading her?
Uh, just an old Graham Greene. [Michael] Oh, she'll love that.
translation.es: - Uno de Graham Greene. - Le va a encantar.

translation.en: So...
-I'm on my way. -Oh.
All right, now. Thanks, Harper.
Next time.
[Michael] Great.
Give my love to Jenny.
Bye, Hanna.
He's better for your mother, wouldn't you say?
translation.es: Él es mejor para tu madre, ¿no te parece?

translation.en: Much, much better.
You got some color in your cheeks.
translation.es: Tienes un poco de color en las mejillas.

translation.en: That's nice.
The Nyamoya case is about to begin.
translation.es: El caso Nyamoya está por comenzar.

translation.en: I don't think it'll give us all the answers, but it's a start.
translation.es: No creo que nos dé todas las respuestas, pero es un comienzo.

translation.en: It's a start, darling.
And...
Daddy will find the end. I promise.
So where are we at?
Frank, my mother just called.
She needs me to pick something up from her office on my way home.
translation.es: Necesita que recoja algo de su oficina de camino a casa.

translation.en: [Eve] Is she still in there?
Give that to me.
Give it to me, now.
How much did you see?
-Uh... -It's illegal. What you're doing, it's illegal.
translation.es: Es ilegal lo que estás haciendo.

translation.en: [sighs] Is-- Is this a taxi rank job?
translation.es: ¿Es como un trabajo de taxista? ¿No tuviste otra opción?

translation.en: -You didn't have a choice? -Of course I did.
translation.es: ¿Es como un trabajo de taxista? ¿No tuviste otra opción? Claro que la tuve.

translation.en: And I...
I just... I don't understand. Why?
Take a long, hard look.
Look at it.
And you remember it.
Remember it,
and then one day,
hopefully one day soon, you'll understand.
translation.es: ojalá que un día cercano, lo entenderás.

translation.en: Take a look at this.
Take a good hard look.
This is what they did to me.
translation.es: Esto es lo que me hicieron.

translation.en: I don't remember my family.
Or my country.
Nothing.
I don't know my own name!
The only thing I know is that it happened
translation.es: Lo único que sé es que esto le pasó…

translation.en: to nearly a million people, and I will never forget it.
translation.es: …a casi un millón de personas y que nunca voy a olvidarlo.

translation.en: -And neither should anyone else. -And no one will.
translation.es: - Y nadie debería. - Nadie lo olvidará.

translation.en: Except you're going to give them the excuse!
translation.es: ¡Pero tú vas a darles la excusa!

translation.en: I don't know what's in there.
translation.es: No sé qué hay ahí adentro.

translation.en: But it won't match this.
translation.es: Pero nunca será lo mismo que esto.

translation.en: But you push that, and everyone can go back to what they really think.
translation.es: Y, si insistes con eso, todos volverán a creer lo que realmente piensan.

translation.en: That down there,
genocide, war crimes, that's just what they all do to each other.
translation.es: el genocidio y los crímenes de guerra es lo que nos hacemos unos a otros.

translation.en: That we're all just cats in a bag.
translation.es: Que somos como gatos dentro de una bolsa.

translation.en: That we're all just monkeys.
I don't give a shit what they think up here. I'm only talking to the people that matter.
translation.es: Me importa un carajo lo que piensen aquí, solo hablo con la gente que importa.

translation.en: And if they don't want to see their country turn into...
translation.es: Y si no quieren que su país se convierta…

translation.en: -Oh, the arrogance. -...into another fucking Yugoslavia,
they'll need to listen.
And so will you.
And you're the only one to tell us.
translation.es: Y tú eres la única que puede decírnoslo.

translation.en: Yes, I am.
I really, really am.
Spoken like a true muzungu.
Don't. I'm leaving tomorrow.
And I will never understand why.
translation.es: Y yo nunca entenderé por qué.

translation.en: [crying] Don't expect me at home.
[man] It's Corporal Benoit, right?
[Benoit] Sir.
You want to make a difference, Corporal?
Then don't end up like me.
Mum!
Mum!
Mama!
Mum!
Mum!
-Mama. -[automated voice] Leave a message after the tone.
translation.es: - Mamá. - Deje un mensaje después de la señal.

translation.en: It's me. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry, Mum. What I said was unforgivable, and I'm sorry.
translation.es: Lo siento, mamá, lo que dije fue imperdonable.

translation.en: I love you.
-Call me. -[phone beeps]
I know who owns these vehicles.
translation.es: Sé quién es el dueño de estos vehículos.

translation.en: Your boss is one of the most wanted men in Africa.
translation.es: Su jefe es uno de los hombres más buscados de África.

translation.en: Now, where is he? [shouts] Where is he?
translation.es: ¿Dónde está ahora? - ¿Dónde está? - Tenis, señor. Tenis.

translation.en: Tennis. Tennis, sir.
On doctor's orders. Secure the area!
translation.es: Por orden del médico, ¡aseguren el área!

translation.en: [man] What the fuck do you think you are doing?
Oh, what does it look like I'm doing?
Stand them down.
This is an indictment against Patrice Ganimana.
translation.es: Esta es el acta de acusación contra Patrice Ganimana.

translation.en: It is not a warrant.
Well, it'll have to do. Apparently, he's playing tennis.
translation.es: Bueno, tendrá que servir. Aparentemente, está jugando al tenis.

translation.en: Stand...
them...
down.
We're blue hats, Colonel.
Can't shoot until you're shot at.
[major] Who fired? Who fired?
-[major] Weapon down! Weapon down! -[man panting]
On your knees. On your knees!
Who fired first? [shouting] Who fired first?
Fuck, fuck, fuck!
Oh, shit! Oh, shit!
What is this? Benoit.
Benoit!
Medic!
Medic!
Aw, shit. Fuck. [panting]
Please.
Oh, fuck.
You're not Ganimana.
Oh, fuck.
You're not Patrice Ganimana.
But I saw him. [crying] I know it.
translation.es: Pero yo lo vi. Estoy seguro.

translation.en: Jesus Christ!
[Eve] Look, I can only say what I always have.
translation.es: Solo puedo decir lo que siempre digo.

translation.en: That although this place may be many thousands of miles
translation.es: Que aunque este lugar esté a miles de kilómetros

translation.en: from the events from which it must adjudicate,
translation.es: de los hechos que en él se juzgan,

translation.en: I believe that what we do here,
translation.es: creo que lo que hacemos aquí,

translation.en: particularly now,
when nations are turning their backs on international responsibility,
translation.es: cuando las naciones le dan la espalda a la responsabilidad internacional,

translation.en: what happens here becomes all the more important.
For countries that have no recourse to justice,
translation.es: Por los países que no tienen acceso a la justicia

translation.en: for people who believe that day will never come,
translation.es: y por quienes creen que ese día nunca llegará,

translation.en: we're trying to make a difference.
Thank you.
No matter what.
